TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UserShapesReference extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Drawing.Charts.RelationshipIdType

Docs.summary: Defines the UserShapesReference Class. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is c:userShapes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **userShapes (Reference to Chart Drawing Part)** This element specifies a relationship to a separate part which contains a drawing to be drawn on top of the chart. |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |chartSpace (§21.2.2.29)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |id (Relationship Reference)

Namespace: *.../officeDocument/2006/relationships*|Specifies the relationship ID for the relationship for this Chart or Chart Drawing part. The type of relationship needed is specified by the parent element.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_RelationshipId* simple type (§22.8.2.1).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_RelId) is located in §A.5.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the UserShapesReference class.

Public Overrides Function CloneNode (deep As Boolean) As OpenXmlElement

Docs.param: true to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; false to clone only the node itself.
Docs.summary: Creates a duplicate of this node.
